settings.text: Give it a try for 60 days completely risk-free. If you're not 100% satisfied, we'll give you a full refund, no questions asked!

settings.heading: Why are your perfumes so affordable?
settings.content:
Our perfumes are affordable because we focus on what really matters — the fragrance itself — and eliminate unnecessary costs:

✔️ No expensive advertising – We don’t invest in celebrity campaigns or luxury branding, which allows us to offer lower prices.

✔️ Simple, elegant packaging – Instead of costly designer bottles, we use minimalist, stylish packaging that keeps production costs low.

✔️ Direct sales model – By selling online and bottling ourselves, we avoid intermediaries and retail mark-ups.

✔️ Alternative compositions, premium quality – Our fragrances are inspired by luxury brands but created under our own label, so you get high-quality scents without paying for the brand name.

The result? You enjoy long-lasting, high-quality perfumes at a price that makes sense.

settings.heading: Is it a perfumed water?
settings.content:
Our fragrances go far beyond simple perfumed water. At Try Scent, we offer high-quality Eau de Parfum (EDP) with a perfume oil concentration of 19-21%, ensuring long-lasting scent, excellent projection, and depth.

Unlike light body sprays or perfumed waters, our compositions are made to stay on your skin for many hours — often even until the next day. You enjoy an intense, refined fragrance experience at a fraction of the price of luxury brands.

settings.heading: How long does the perfume last?
settings.content:
Our perfumes are designed for excellent longevity. Thanks to a high fragrance oil concentration of 19-21%, most of our scents stay noticeable on the skin for up to 24 hours, and often the fragrance can still be detected on clothes or hair the next day.

Of course, the exact durability depends on the specific fragrance, your skin type, and how it's applied — but compared to typical alternatives or light Eau de Toilette, Try Scent perfumes deliver significantly better performance.

settings.heading: Is the inspired fragrance different?
settings.content:
No — our inspired fragrances are designed as an exact copy of the originals from famous luxury brands. We carefully recreate the same fragrance structure, using identical scent notes and raw materials wherever possible.

✔️ 1:1 fragrance impression – The scent is virtually indistinguishable from the original, even for experienced perfume lovers.

✔️ Same longevity and projection – Thanks to the high concentration of perfume oils (19-21%), our fragrances last just as long as the originals.

✔️ Affordable price, no compromise – You get the exact same olfactory experience without paying for the logo, marketing, or designer packaging.

In short: Our perfumes are identical to luxury brands in scent, quality, and durability — the only difference is the price.

settings.heading: What does 19-21% perfume mean?
settings.content:
The percentage indicates the concentration of pure fragrance oils in the product. In our case, 19-21% perfume concentration means:

✔️ It is classified as Eau de Parfum (EDP) — one of the most intense types of perfume available for daily use.

✔️ High fragrance oil content ensures excellent longevity — the scent stays noticeable on your skin for many hours, often until the next day.

✔️ Strong projection and depth — the fragrance unfolds in layers and maintains a rich, lasting character.

For comparison:

  • 5-15% fragrance oils.
  • 15-25%, so our perfumes are at the upper end of this category.
  • 25%, but is often much more expensive.

In short: With 19-21%, you get an intense, long-lasting, and high-quality fragrance experience — perfect for anyone who wants designer-like performance at an affordable price.

settings.heading: Compositions of Perfumes
settings.content: Alcohol Denat. Parfum (Fragrance) Aqua (Water) Limonene Linalool Citronellol Geraniol Citral Benzyl Salicylate Coumarin Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone Hexyl Cinnamal Benzyl Benzoate

settings.title: How We Compare
settings.review_text: “All my fragrances are amazing! The scent lasts so long, and they all smell just like the designer ones. I receive so many compliments on them - very satisfied!”

settings.heading: Do your fragrances smell the same as the designer inspiration?
settings.row_content:
Our fragrances are expertly crafted to capture the essence and character of popular designer scents. While we create inspired interpretations rather than exact copies, 98% of our customers say our
fragrances are virtually identical to the original brands they love. Each fragrance is carefully developed to deliver the same luxurious experience at a fraction of the cost.

settings.heading: How can I trust the quality at the price point you offer?
settings.row_content:
We cut out the middleman and brand markup, not the quality.
Our fragrances are made in Canada using high concentrations of premium fragrance oils, the same quality ingredients found in luxury brands. We're so confident in our products that we offer a 60-day money-back guarantee. Plus, thousands of 5-star reviews from happy customers speak to our consistent
quality.

settings.heading: How long will the scent last?
settings.row_content: Our Eau de Parfum formulations contain high concentrations of quality fragrance oils, typically lasting 12+ hours on the skin. Longevity can vary based on skin type, application method, and individual body chemistry. For best results, apply to pulse points on clean, moisturized skin.

settings.heading: Are your products vegan friendly and cruelty free?
settings.row_content: We only use vegan-friendly fragrance oils, and of course they are cruelty-free! We wouldn't have it any other way. Smell good, feel good, do good.

settings.heading: Can I return/exchange if I don't like the scent?
settings.row_content:
Yes. We offer a 60-day money-back guarantee. If you're not
completely satisfied with your fragrance, simply return it within 60 days for a
full refund. You can even test the fragrance once or twice before deciding. No
questions asked, no hassle.

settings.heading: Are your fragrances safe for sensitive skin?
settings.row_content: Our fragrances are formulated to high safety standards, but like all fragrances, they may contain allergens. We recommend patch testing before full use, especially if you have sensitive skin. All ingredients comply with international safety regulations for cosmetic products.

settings.title: TryScent Guarantee
settings.description:
At TryScent, we believe in fragrances that make you feel amazing. That's why we offer a 60-day money-back guarantee—so you can shop with confidence.

If you're not completely in love with your scent, simply return it within 60 days for a full refund. No hassle, no stress—just a promise that you'll find a fragrance you truly adore.
